summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges incurred, including transportation charges, discounts, and total amounts due. The invoice also includes information about adjustments and payment due dates.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated June 17, 2002, and is addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Total charges on the invoice amount to $177.49.
The invoice includes details of transportation charges, discounts, and special handling fees.
Ghislaine Maxwell and Elizabeth Maxwell are mentioned as recipients of packages sent by Epstein.
Marie Joseph Experton Berlioz and Jeanne Brennan are also mentioned as senders of packages related to Epstein.
